short_summary: Request for Proposal for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services contract
description: CAS is on a digital transformation journey...support CAS' digital business transformation and delivery of its strategic objectives.
full_summary:
____________________________________________________
**TASK-BASED INFORMATICS PROFESSIONAL SERVICES (TBIPS)**

Reference Number: | 5X001-23-0430
Amendment Number: | 1
Publication Date: | August 30, 2023
Tender Closing Date: | September 11, 2023 (14:00:00)
Expected Contract Start Date: | September 25, 2023
Expected Contract End Date: | September 24, 2024

**Description of Opportunity**
The Courts Administration Service (CAS) is seeking to establish a contract with one or more professional services firms to access digital talent on an as and when required basis to support CAS’ digital business transformation and delivery of its strategic objectives.

**Key Requirements**
The successful bidder will be required to provide multiple resource categories with expertise in various areas of digital talent to support CAS’ digital transformation objectives. Security requirements include Common PS SRCL #19, with a minimum corporate security requirement of Designated Organization Screening (DOS) and a minimum resource security requirement of Enhanced Reliability.

**Trade Agreements**
This tender may be subject to the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA).

**Contact Information**
To obtain a copy of the tender documents and RFP, please submit inquiries to Marco Pelchat, Consultant, Procurement at Procurement.Approvisionnement@cas-satj.gc.ca or (613) 315-7390.

**Submission Requirements**
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language.

**Method of Supply**
Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Method of Supply is refreshed three (3) times per year. To find out how you can become a “Qualified SA Holder”, please contact RCNMDAI.NCRIMOS@pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Attachments**
The tender notice and RFP documents are available for download here: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8437/5x001-
